item.description: Bob and I will be hiking Lowes Path and checking out the RMC lodging below Mt Adams. My pace is slower, just out to take in the scenery and get a good work out. Bring $ to park at the Lowes Country Store
item.how_to_find_us: carpool from Tilton or meet at Lowes store. talk to me 603-477-5116 so I know you are coming and we will meet on time
item.name: Exploring Lowe's Path and the RMC trails 8 mi/intermediate pace/photo
